pinyin: shu4 zi4 yong4 hu4 xian4 lu4

definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
